title: Congratulations program for +2 students
details: Join us for the Congratulating programme for the students who passed their +2 boards from parashar college.

title: Annual Sports Meet
details: Get ready for our annual sports meet! Participate in various sports events and cheer for your peers. Prizes for winners!

title: Scholarship Application Deadline
details: Don't miss the deadline to apply for scholarships. Check the admissions office for eligibility and application details.
